channel.title: Posts on The Blog of Mason Wilde
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Blog of Mason Wilde

item.title: Welcome
item.description: This is a long overdue blog for my various musings. I am an OS and ML/AI Software Engineer with experience working in Cognitive Control Systems research, Search Algorithms, DevOps, and ChromeOS. In my spare time, I enjoy making small games and apps to solve various problems I come across in life. I hope to flesh this site out with links to my projects, webapps, and other documentation. I’ll probably also add sections for other hobbies such as DnD, cooking, lifting, and hiking.
